mcq.statement: Which significant fact was demonstrated by the 1937 elections regarding the representation of Muslims in India?

options.a: Only the Muslim League represented all Muslims
options.c: Neither the Muslim League nor Congress represented all Muslims
options.d: Both parties equally represented all Muslims

mcq.one_liner: The 1937 elections showed that neither the Muslim League nor the Congress could claim to represent all the Muslims of India, highlighting the diversity of Muslim political opinion.
